source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_SEQ_00<tab>Trachtoum appears to be ignoring you.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_SEQ_00<tab>風車番の小屋にいるトラッハトゥームは、まだまだ冒険者を認めていないようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_SEQ_01<tab>Trachtoum is concerned that you lack the strength to face a primal in battle. If you wish to prove yourself to him, you must head west of the Grey Fleet, search for any goobbues in the area, and slay them if they approach.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_SEQ_01<tab>トラッハトゥームは、ネズミ討伐をこなした程度では、タイタンの情報はやれない……と、新たな課題を提示した。次の彼の指示通り、「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8C7201 /var>」を調査し、現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207C201 /var>」を倒そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_SEQ_02<tab>Although Trachtoum's instructions nearly lead you into the gaping maw of a goobbue, you dispatch the giant beast with little difficulty. Return to Trachtoum and tell him of your accomplishments.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207C201 /var>を倒した。グレイフリート風車群の風車番の小屋にいるトラッハトゥームに報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_SEQ_03<tab>Your deeds serve to shock the veteran marauder, but they are not enough to earn his confidence. It seems you have much and more left to do...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_SEQ_03<tab>冒険者が<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207C201 /var>を倒したことで、トラッハトゥームはとても驚いているようだが、自分ならもっと早く倒せたという……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TODO_00<tab>Search for goobbues west of the Grey Fleet.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8C7201 /var>で付近を調べて<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207C201 /var>を討伐

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_000<tab>...What? Ye still askin' about how we beat Tidus? I dunno, 'venturer...it was a pretty risky strategy, the kind only a veteran of ten score battles could rely upon.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_000……はやくタコタンの情報を教えろって？
ふふん、元海雄旅団の俺様に言わせれば、
ネズミ退治程度の働きじゃあ、まだまだ教えらんねえな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_001<tab>I want to teach ye, I truly do! But unless ye prove ye have what it takes to face that fat bastard, I can't in good conscience tell you a damn thing!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_001なんつったって、相手はタコタンだからな！
つれーなー！　教えてやりたいけど、
それなりの対価がないとなー！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_002<tab>At the very least, ye'd need to be capable of slayin', say, a goobbue...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_002……そうだなぁ。
「」を倒したら、
本当に話してやってもいいぜ？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_003<tab>Come to think of it, that ain't a bad idea. Them creatures have a taste for the flour milled here, so ye ought to have no trouble findin' one in the vicinity.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_003「」は、たまに付近にあらわれてよ。
風車で挽いた小麦をめちゃくちゃにすっから、
困ってんだよなー。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_004<tab>'Course, I ain't askin' ye to cut one down quick as a skilled axeman like meself!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_004まぁ、元海雄旅団の俺様だったら、3秒で倒せるが……
お前には、無理かもしれねぇなぁ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_005<tab>Anyroad, why don't ye try headin' due west an' standin' lookout 'case a goobbue comes callin'? Slay it, an' I might consider tellin' ye more about ol' Tidus.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_005さぁ、やれるもんならやってみろ。
近くを調べてみれば、
きっと例のグゥーブーが現われるはずさ！
TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_DUMMY_000_010<tab>指定地点で「見まわす」すると特殊グゥーブーポップ

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_020<tab>Eh? You again? Then that goobbue that was harassin' the millers is dead?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_020えっ……まじで？
あの「」を倒してきたの？
……まじかー。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_021<tab>Didn't think ye had it in ye, 'venturer. Still, you took forever an' a day to get the job done. I'm still not sure if I should tell you our secrets...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_TRACHTOUM_000_021……け、結構やるじゃねえか。
ま、まあ俺様だったら、もっと早く倒せたけどな……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB003_00810_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>You feel the ground tremble beneath your feet...
